content: This essay doesn’t really answer for me the question “why did so many evangelicals vote for Trump?” I truly would like an answer to this question. Most -not all — of the Christians that I know, loathe the man as he’s the antithesis of what Christianity stands for; they voted either for Secretary Clinton or one of the independents. This essay and the work of Mr. Bialecki doesn’t answer this question for me. First, it’s a rather thin slice of Christendom that he reports on. Second, the quote about “God showing up” is totally ridiculous and frankly shows that whoever thinks this way is probably deluded. The God that I worship does work in mysterious ways — I’ll give you that. To send our nation into true chaos because of the election of the most hateful businessman hardly seems miraculous to me…unless the goal is to destroy our nation. Hmm… Is that what they mean about God and miracles?
